subject: Re: Long clip at ESNIPS
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
That's really good communication.

-Steve H.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Kristin" <ckmorris95@...> wrote:
>
> I realize that the clip is long but it is a good example of hearing
> them real time and responding back and forth for those that need to
> hear an example of that. 
> I was trying to end the session and I missed the PLEASE DONT real time
> but I heard them say WAIT. They then say DONT LEAVE YET. I even hear
> them say HURRY! 
> There is some more back and forth while we try to get everyone back
> over. I must drive them crazy because on playback I hear done complete
> and here a bunch but eventually I here them and end the session.
> Its over at ESNIPS because the file is too large for here.
> Check it out: 
> http://www.esnips.com/doc/6a4f2cc7-749c-4758-b5e4-de25fbe1c4c4/DONT-
LEAVE-YET-ONE-MORE-HURRY-DONE-COMPLETE-HERE
> I hope the link works.
> k
>
